tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE auction_platform (
    auction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_title VARCHAR(255),
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    opening_bid DECIMAL(10, 2),
    current_bid DECIMAL(10, 2),
    bidder_name VARCHAR(255),
    bid_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    auction_status VARCHAR(20),
    payment_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE auction_status (
    auction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    auction_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    auction_start TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    auction_end TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    current_bid DECIMAL,
    highest_bidder VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE payment_processing (
    payment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    bidder_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    bid_id INT,
    payment_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    payment_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Bidding_info (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    bidder_id INT,
    bid_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    bid_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Auction_status (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    auction_id INT,
    auction_start_time TIMESTAMP,
    auction_end_time TIMESTAMP,
    highest_bid DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Payment_processing (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    payment_id INT,
    bidder_id INT,
    payment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    payment_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE User_info (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    registration_date DATE,
    address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE BiddingInformation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bidder_id INT,
    artwork_id INT,
    bid_amount DECIMAL,
    bid_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE AuctionStatus (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    auction_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE PaymentProcessing (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    payment_id INT,
    bidder_id INT,
    payment_amount DECIMAL,
    payment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ArtworkInformation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_id INT,
    title VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    starting_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE ParticipantInformation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id INT,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    address TEXT
);
